price: Nanso (Farao) de neho too netumi so kaa sε: “Nkoyaayini anaasε ͻbͻdamfoͻ”.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
